summary: 2015  is a common year starting on Thursday in the Gregorian calendar and is the current year.
full_text:
2015  is the current year, and is a common year starting on Thursday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 2015th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 15th year of the 3rd millennium, the 15th year of the 21st century, and the 6th year of the 2010s decade.
2015 has been designated as the International Year of Light and the International Year of Soils by the sixty-eighth session of the United Nations General Assembly.
